name: Не падай!
description:
[AT THIS MOMENT GAME DOES NOT CONTAIN ENGLISH LANGUAGE]
Very simple and colorful game, overcome obstacles, collect hearts and buy new vehicles such as garbage truck, fire truck, taxi, police car and many others.

The complexity of the game will automatically increase as you progress through and will not get bored even the most experienced players.

Bright, simple and stylish graphics, it is not demanding on your computer, thanks to the remarkable optimization.

You are important, don't fall!
